title: UI5Lab
description: A community-driven project to establish a repository for UI5 Custom Control Libraries.

title: UI5 Schemas
description: UI5 Schemas allows you to develop SAPUI5/OpenUI5 XML at a maximum convenience in WebStorm.

title: ui5-codecompletion
description: Node module (CLI) to configure WebStorm with UI5 code completion in *.js files.

title: Easy UI5
description: Generator for OpenUI5 apps using the official UI5 tooling and supporting deployment to SAP Cloud Platform.

title: meteor-ui5
description: A collection of packages that brings together two open source JavaScript web frameworks: Meteor and OpenUI5.

title: Ui5Strap
description: App development toolkit for desktop, cloud and mobile. Based on OpenUI5 + Bootstrap.
